strings.Value: "I'm looking for a piece of the First Crown."

{n}Just ahead, a man in the dark robes of a Pharasmin priest battles an enormous spiked beast. While he's holding his own with magic and a sword with a melted-looking hilt, the snarling beast has him cornered. Suddenly he catches sight of you.{/n} "You there! Help me with this thing!"
"My name's Salimâ€”you'll excuse me if we forego formal introductions until I'm not fighting for my life!"
"It's a linnorm! A total killing machine! It's mad now, but if it gets frumious, we're all screwed!"

{n}The priest shoots you an incredulous look.{/n} "Seriously? This thing's trying to turn me into a dinner! Besides, {g|Shyka}Shyka{/g} sent you, right? If so, you're here to help me. So help already!"

"Well, you're too late!"{n} The man points to the creature with his sword.{/n} "The damned linnorm swallowed it before I could grab it. So either we kill this thing and cut the crown out, or we all get digested along with it!"
{n}The priest shakes his head in disgust.{/n} "And you're what passes for an adventurer these days? Pathetic."
